H0.text: What homonymic word refers both to a pit and a hunted animal. Prey

H1.text: What homonymic word refers both to a pit and a hunted animal. Den

H2.text: What homonymic word refers both to a pit and a hunted animal. Lair

H3.text: What homonymic word refers both to a pit and a hunted animal. Quary

A4.text: A quarry is a type of open-pit mine in which dimension stone, rock, construction aggregate, riprap, sand, gravel, or slate is excavated from the ground.
